Job Title: Aviation Front Desk Customer Service Job - Full Time

Location: Lanai City, HI

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Why You’ll Love This Aviation Client Services Representative Job

Did you ever want to work in aviation but didn’t know how to break into the industry? Would you like working in a fast-paced environment around some of the most incredible professionals in aviation? If so, this Client Services Representative position with Atlantic Aviation in Lanai City, HI may be perfect for you!

In this position, you will be the first point of contact for clientele arriving at the facility. You will get the opportunity to interact with many large corporations’ flight departments and high-profile clients! In this position, you will perform assigned tasks related to providing services for corporate aircraft, cargo and passenger charters, and other general aviation aircraft.

Use your experience and outgoing personality to build a career in aviation you are excited about and apply for the Client Services Representative job today! 

This position pays between $16 - $18 per hour! This position requires availability for any/all shifts as well as overtime, weekends, holidays, and on call. You must be a current HI resident!

Responsibilities

Client Services Representative Responsibilities

Provide customers with professional service and assistanceMaking hotel and catering reservations for inbound and outbound aircraftProcessing customer purchases and fuel transactionsWork closely with line service personnel and pilots, ensuring all customer service needs are metProvide and coordinate ground handling servicesCoordination of all airport agencies for flight arrivals and departuresCommunicate with customersAssist with customer service duties

Required Skills

Client Services Representative Qualifications

Customer service/hospitality experienceHigh school diploma or GED certificate18 years of ageA valid state driver’s licenseAbility to comprehend and perform basic math calculationsMust be living in HawaiiMust be able to obtain AOA badge and pass TSA Security Threat AssessmentMust be able to pass 10-year FBI background check

We maintain a drug-free workplace and perform pre-employment substance testing.
